author: craigmcc
msg: Add Bip Thelin as a volunteer to work on the JDBC-based Store implementation.

author: craigmcc
msg: Explicitly identify the destination of the form submit, so that this page
works correctly when used in a form-based login environment.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a new unit test to validate correct behavior of isUserInRole() for
* Role name mapped directly to a user --> true
* Role name specified in a <security-role-ref> element for a role name
mapped directly to a user --> true
* Role name not mapped to a user --> false

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the implementation of HttpServletRequest.isUserInRole() so that it
properly respects role name aliases defined with <security-role-ref>.

author: glenn
msg: Made setting of SMTP properties more generic
